name: Vast.ai
description: Vast.ai provides a cloud computing marketplace for renting and hosting affordable GPU resources for AI and ML workloads.
longDescription: Vast.ai is a cloud computing platform that connects users with affordable GPU rentals for compute-intensive tasks like AI and machine learning. It enables individuals and businesses to rent out their spare GPU capacity or access powerful GPUs at significantly lower costs than traditional cloud providers. The platform supports a global network of providers, ranging from individual hobbyists to Tier 4 data centers, ensuring scalability and flexibility. Vast.ai's mission is to democratize access to AI compute resources, making high-performance computing accessible to a broader audience. Its intuitive interface, API, and CLI streamline the process of finding, renting, or hosting GPU resources. By offering on-demand and interruptible pricing, Vast.ai optimizes cost-efficiency for users.
features: Rent GPUs at 3-5x lower costs than traditional cloud providers, enabling affordable AI and ML workloads.
Spin up high-performance GPU instances in seconds for rapid deployment of compute-intensive tasks.
Access a global marketplace of over 10,000 GPUs, scalable from single units to large clusters.
Use preconfigured templates for one-click launches of AI/ML frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow.
Automate infrastructure with a robust API and CLI for seamless programmatic control.
Choose between on-demand, interruptible, or reserved pricing to optimize costs.
Leverage secure, ISO 27001-certified data centers for sensitive or production workloads.
Host your own GPUs to monetize spare capacity with flexible pricing and scheduling.
Access 24/7 expert support for cluster deployment and performance optimization.
Integrate with container-based workflows like Docker and Kubernetes for easy scaling.
Use real-time cost tracking and resource utilization dashboards to manage expenses.

faqs.question: What is Vast.ai?
faqs.answer: Vast.ai is a cloud computing marketplace that connects users with affordable GPU rentals for AI, ML, and other compute-intensive tasks while allowing providers to monetize spare GPU capacity.

faqs.question: How does Vast.ai reduce costs compared to traditional cloud providers?
faqs.answer: Vast.ai offers GPU rentals at 3-5x lower prices by aggregating resources from a global network of providers, including hobbyists and data centers, with flexible pricing models.

faqs.question: Can I rent GPUs for short-term projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vast.ai supports on-demand and interruptible pricing, allowing users to rent GPUs for short-term tasks with per-second billing and no long-term commitments.

faqs.question: How can I host my GPUs on Vast.ai?
faqs.answer: You can list your GPUs on Vast.ai, set your own prices and schedules, and use their tools to connect with customers, streamlining the hosting process.

faqs.question: What is the Secure Cloud filter?
faqs.answer: The Secure Cloud filter ensures you rent from verified providers in ISO 27001-certified or Tier 3/4 data centers, ideal for sensitive or production workloads.

faqs.question: Does Vast.ai support Jupyter notebooks?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vast.ai provides preconfigured templates with Jupyter setup, allowing users to run notebooks like Colab by uploading .ipynb files to their instances.

faqs.question: What types of GPUs are available on Vast.ai?
faqs.answer: Vast.ai offers a range of GPUs, including NVIDIA 4090s, A100s, H100s, and more, suitable for various AI and ML workloads.

faqs.question: How do I handle slow file transfers in Jupyter?
faqs.answer: For faster transfers, select the direct HTTPS mode in Jupyter settings instead of the default proxy mode, and import the provided certificate.

faqs.question: Can I scale my GPU usage for large projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vast.ai allows seamless scaling from single GPUs to clusters of hundreds, with customizable networking and storage options.
